title: Annual Cultural Fest 2025
description: Join us for the Annual Cultural Fest featuring exciting performances, competitions, and guest speakers. Open to all students and instructors.

title: Library Book Return Deadline
description: Students are reminded to return all borrowed library books by the deadline to avoid late fees. Contact the library staff for queries.

title: Workshop on Career Development
description: A workshop on resume building, interview preparation, and career planning. Register online to secure your spot.

title: Sports Day 2025
description: Participate in our annual Sports Day! Competitions include football, cricket, athletics, and more. Prizes for winners.

title: Mid-Term Exam Schedule Announcement
description: The mid-term exam schedule for all departments has been released. Check the notice board or the university portal for details.
